CmdLine: apt-get update &&     apt-get -y install --no-install-recommends build-essential                                                ca-certificates                                                devscripts                                                     equivs                                                         git &&     git clone https://github.com/kytvi2p/i2pd.git -b debian/stable &&     cd i2pd &&     yes | mk-build-deps -i &&     debuild -B -uc -us &&     dpkg -i ../i2pd_*.deb &&     dpkg -P i2pd-build-deps             build-essential             devscripts                  equivs                      git &&     yes | apt-get autoremove &&     COLUMNS=150 dpkg -l | awk '/^rc/{print $2}' | xargs dpkg -P &&     cd / &&     rm -rf /i2pd* &&     apt-get clean &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* /var/tmp/* /tmp/*
Commands.Name: run
